Skill.Name: Implode
Skill.Description: Create a vortex that draws enemies in before exploding

Skill.Name: Ignite
Skill.Description: Launch a firey shot that explodes on impact

Skill.Name: Shockwave
Skill.Description: Release a shockwave pushing away nearby enemies

Skill.Name: Swarm
Skill.Description: Release a ring of bullets around you

Skill.Name: Seek
Skill.Description: For a short while your shots will seek nearby enemies

Skill.Name: Impact
Skill.Description: For a short while your shots will explode on impact

Skill.Name: Needle
Skill.Description: Launch three fast moving shards in front of you

Skill.Name: Revenge
Skill.Description: For a short while deal more damage when your health is low

Skill.Name: Drain
Skill.Description: Deal Void damage to nearby enemies and heal for each enemy hit

Skill.Name: Defile
Skill.Description: Deal Void damage to nearby enemies, if they die, they explode

Skill.Name: Immolate
Skill.Description: Draw enemies towards you, then explode with Fire

Skill.Name: Leach
Skill.Description: For a short while being near enemies heals you

Skill.Name: Scour
Skill.Description: For a short while hitting enemies can refill your magazine and heal you

Skill.Name: Erupt
Skill.Description: Release a ring of explosive bombs around you

Skill.Name: Regenerate
Skill.Description: Heal a small amount every second until you are hit

Skill.Name: Wake
Skill.Description: For a short while leave a trail of fire as you move

Skill.Name: Lacerate
Skill.Description: Launch an explosive bomb that heals you for every enemy hit

Skill.Name: Curse
Skill.Description: Mark an area on the ground, enemies within this area take more damage

Skill.Name: Staunch
Skill.Description: Heal a large portion of health

Skill.Name: Fracture
Skill.Description: Launch a grenade that explodes with Shatter damage
